attributes.action: enforce an basic literacy/IQ test for all people creating petitions on this site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Additionally, change this website so that the petition-creation pages include highly-visible tips such as:

'Did you check if your CAPS LOCK key was pressed?', 'Ever heard of punctuation?'
'Isn't the local newspaper letters page more appropriate for this?', 'This isn't another tedious e-petition about some motoring topic, is it?', 'Have you typed your name in where you are supposed to have typed the subject?'

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
